I am a Phd student in the Ecology, Evolution, and Marine Biology department at the University of California, Santa Barbara. I study restoration ecology, plant physiology, and fire ecology/behavior with a plant functional trait framework. Outside of my studies I like to surf, bike, hike, and camp.
